meanings.definition: A person who has undergone ostomy surgery.
meanings.sent1: The ostomate showed great courage in adapting to life after surgery.
meanings.sent2: The hospital provided support groups for ostomates to share their experiences.
meanings.sent3: At the ostomate party, they joked about their new 'superpowers'.
meanings.sent4: She embraced her role as an ostomate, seeing it as a badge of strength.
meanings.sent5: The ostomate's resilience inspired others facing similar challenges.

meanings.definition: To perform ostomy surgery on someone.
meanings.sent1: The surgeon carefully ostomated the patient to improve their quality of life.
meanings.sent2: Doctors train for years to learn how to properly ostomate a patient.
meanings.sent3: The medical team decided to ostomate the patient after thorough consultation.
meanings.sent4: She felt a sense of fulfillment every time she ostomated a successful surgery.
meanings.sent5: The decision to ostomate was made after considering all medical options.
